relation: Hide Layers toolbar when only one layer is open
Catch new window requests to open new layers instead. Overrides catch.
Catch window close requests to close current layer instead. Overrides catch.
Close window when closing last layer
Confirm before closing a window with multiple layers open
Maximum Layers toolbar button width, in pixels (when positive) or characters (when negative). Overrides width.
Minimum Layers toolbar button width, in pixels. Has no effect when maxWidth is negative.
0 = focus last 1 = focus previous 2 = focus next
Where to place new layer: 0 = after last layer 1 = after current layer
Change Layers toolbar position to bottom of window (experimental)
Maximum Layers toolbar button width, in millimeters

textAfterTable: Accelerator commands Example: plugin(command) Command Description (nothing) Open new layer (integer N) Switch to Nth layer (0 < N < 10) Close CloseAll CloseAllOther CloseWindow Config Last Switch to last selected layer Next Open OpenLink OpenLinkBg OpenWindow Prev Macros Macro Description OnCloseGroup Called when the window receives a close request and there are more than one layers open Menu commands Example: plugin(command) or plugin(command, label) Command Description (nothing) Insert list of layers to menu (integer N) Switch to Nth layer (0 < N < 10) Close CloseAll
